metadata.Title: CVE-2018-7554 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - untriaged
metadata.Description:
There is an invalid free in ReadImage in input-bmp.ci that leads to aSegmentation fault in sam2p 0.49.4. A crafted input will lead to a denialof service or possibly unspecified other impact.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-7554` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

sam2p - 0.49.2-3+deb8u3build0.14.04.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: sam2p package in trusty/esm was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.49.2-3+deb8u3build0.14.04.1').
